label: Project ID
description: Unique project ID with first 4 letters of ranch name, year (YY) of practice implementation, and conservation practice abbreviation (see practice_abbreviations.csv)

label: Sample ID
description: Unique sample ID for each sampling location with project_id, treatment (T) or control (C), and sample number

label: Timepoint
description: Timepoint of sampling event, indicating baseline (T0), first sampling after practice implementation (T1), and following events (T2, T3, etc)

label: Sampling Date
description: Date of soil sampling event

label: Latitude
description: Latitude of soil sampling point

label: Longitude
description: Longitude of soil sampling point

label: Target Sampling Depth
description: Planned beginning and end depth of sample separated by _

label: Beginning Depth
description: Starting depth of sample measured by technician or producer. If not entered in AgCDataEntry.csv, assumed to be the same as the target_depth

label: End Depth
description: Starting depth of sample measured by technician or producer. If not entered in AgCDataEntry.csv, assumed to be the same as the target_depth

label: Sample Position
description: Placement of the soil sample relative to perennial crop rows. Alley = between perennial rows, row = within planting rows, shoulder = slope between row and alley. Not applicable in annual crops and rangelands

label: Lab Name
description: Name of lab service provider

label: C Method
description: Method used for soil C quantification

label: Total Soil C
description: Total soil C concentration of sample

label: Total Soil N
description: Total soil N concentration of sample

label: Soil Organic C
description: Soil organic C concentration of sample

label: Soil Inorganic C
description: Soil inorganic C concentration of sample

label: Particulate Organic Matter
description: Particulate organic matter as a percent of total organic matter in sample

label: Particulate Organic C
description: Concentration of particulate organic C in sample

label: Particulate Organic N
description: Concentration of particulate organic N in sample

label: Mineral Associated Organic Matter
description: Mineral-associated organic matter as a percent of total organic matter in sample

label: Mineral Associated Organic C
description: Concentration of mineral-associated organic C in sample

label: Mineral Associate Organic N
description: Concentration of mineral-associated organic N in sample

label: CO2 Respiration
description: CO2-C emitted following soil rewetting CO2 respiration test

label: Microbial biomass C
description: Microbial biomass C calculated from chloroform fumigation

label: Texture Name
description: Texture class observed either in-field or texture by feel in lab. One of 11 USDA texture classes

label: Sand Content
description: Sand content of sample measured in lab

label: Silt Content
description: Silt content of sample measured in lab

label: Clay Content
description: Clay content of sample measured in lab

label: pH Method
description: Whether pH was measured in lab or in field

label: pH
description: pH of sample, measured in-field or in lab

label: Buffer pH
description: Buffer pH indicating soil's resistance to changes in pH

label: Bulk Density Method
description: Specify method for bulk density measurement

label: Bulk Density
description: Bulk density of sample, calculated by dividing mass of dry soil (rocks and roots removed) by total volume of sampling core

label: Rock Mass
description: Weight of rocks removed from bulk density sample

label: Nitrate
description: Nitrate concentration (NO3-N)

label: Phosphorus
description: Phosphorus concentration

label: Potassium
description: Potassium concentration by NH4 acetate extraction

label: Sulfur
description: Sulfur concentration by NH4 acetate extraction

label: Calcium
description: Calcium concentration by NH4 acetate extraction

label: Magnesium
description: Magnesium concentration by NH4 acetate extraction

label: Sodium
description: Sodium concentration by NH4 acetate extraction

label: Zinc
description: Zinc concentration by NH4 acetate extraction

label: Iron
description: Iron concentration by NH4 acetate extraction

label: Manganese
description: Manganese concentration by NH4 acetate extraction

label: Copper
description: Copper concentration by NH4 acetate extraction

label: Soil Moisture
description: Soil moisture measured in lab or during in-house bulk density processing

label: Soluble salts
description: Soluble salts

label: Cation Exchange Capacity
description: Sum of cations calculated from cation NH4 acetate extraction and buffer pH

label: Hydrogen base saturation
description: Hydrogen base saturation

label: Potassium base saturation
description: Potassium base saturation

label: Calcium base saturation
description: Calcium base saturation

label: Magnesium base saturation
description: Magnesium base saturation

label: Sodium base saturation
description: Sodium base saturation
